title: Create block shorthand
description: Can generate the 3 steps required to prompt the user to add a block to their project

category.markdownDescription: The category where the target block lives. Example: `toolbox#app`

blockType.markdownDescription: The type of block to be created. Example: `onAppStart`

connectTo.markdownDescription: Will prompt the user to connect their newly created block to the connection provided here

alias.markdownDescription: An **alias** to give this block once the user created it. Use this to refer to that block in the following steps using the querying syntax. Example: You create the alias `block_0`, you will be able to refer to it with `alias#block_0`

openFlyoutCopy.markdownDescription: The message displayed in the guide widget prompting the user to open the right category

grabBlockCopy.markdownDescription: The message displayed in the guide widget prompting the user to grab the correct block from the flyout

dropCopy.markdownDescription: The message displayed in the guide widget prompting the user to drop a block onto the code space

connectCopy.markdownDescription: The message displayed in the guide widget prompting the user to connect a block to another

override.description: Define extra data used to override the steps generated by this shorthand
